/bin/cc   -g -O2 -Wall -pthread -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -D_GNU_SOURCE -fvisibility=hidden    CMakeFiles/test_native_mini_dfs.dir/test_native_mini_dfs.c.o  -o test_native_mini_dfs -rdynamic libnative_mini_dfs.a /home/hadoop/software/jdk1.8.0_191/jre/lib/amd64/server/libjvm.so -Wl,-rpath,/home/hadoop/software/jdk1.8.0_191/jre/lib/amd64/server
